messages.subject: sticking it out with friends
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:47:57 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Yes. It should be! That is really sick.... Funny thing is, we have a lock on the outside of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/5/2003 11:47:57 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> <<Later I learned that this poor Luke actually has a latch up high on the
> outside of his bedroom door so that he cannot leave during nap our bed time.
>
> Yikes. >>
>
> That should be illegal.

Yes. It should be! That is really sick....

Funny thing is, we have a lock on the outside of Sierra's door. It could
leave the wrong impression. Dh put it there to keep babsy Jalen out, not to keep
anyone in. It has never, ever been locked when anyone was in the room, but I'm
sure it looks rather suspicious now that I think about it!!
We have an old house and rather than replace her doorknob with one that has a
lock, he just stuck a little hook and eye at the top of her door. We can lock
kids out if we need to, so she can have a sane room without her dolls ripped
up. :)

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
